findings.title: Exposure Of Permissioned VaultFarm::massUpdatePools()
findings.description: The `VaultFarm` contract has a routine `massUpdatePools()` to update reward variables for all pools with given input parameters, which is permissioned and can be exploited.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `Duet Bond` feature, there is a privileged `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations.
